description: This version of the  Backhand Index Pointing Up emoji has the  Medium-light Skin Tone applied, which is displayed as a Cream White Skin
apple_vendor_description: The backhand index pointing up emoji, rendered with a medium-light skin tone on Apple devices, features a precisely articulated hand with a clear, upward trajectory. Apple's characteristic glossy finish and subtle shading give the finger a realistic texture and a sense of depth. The rounded tip and smooth contours of the knuckle ensure it appears both direct and friendly, making it a versatile tool on Apple devices for indicating direction, emphasis, or agreement with a stylish, digital flourish.
